data.actual_result: The lower area of the menu gets cut off, making you unable to press the buttons
data.expected_result: The menu should be fully visible in landscape mode
data.short_description: "Cancel" and "Leave Group" menu gets cut off in landscape mode when the group DMs name is extremely long
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a group DM - Go to group DM settings - Change the group's name to something that hits the 100 character limit - Press the leave button in the top right corner to open up the confirmation menu - Turn your device into landscape
